text: The Lottery Ticket Seller (Spanish: El billetero) is a 1953 Mexican drama film directed by Raphael J. Sevilla and starring David Silva, Esther Fernández and Rodolfo Acosta.Agrasanchez p.100 ==Cast== * David Silva as Pedro * Esther Fernández as Lupita * Rodolfo Acosta as Marcos Aguirre Torres * Raphael Sevilla hijo as Chiquilín * Arturo Martínez as Agente Silvano Bravo * Antonio Díaz as Crescencio * Gloria Iturbe as Rosita, la viuda Sánchez * Lupe Carriles as Doña Chona * Carmen Manzano as La güerita * Lilian Plancarte as Luchi * Felipe de Flores as Chente * Miguel Ángel Valdés * Hernán Vera as Cantinero * Jorge Casanova as Don Agustín * Víctor Velázquez as Jefe de policía * Enrique Cancino * Maria Aurelia de Torres as Billetera anciana * Moises Esteves * Alfonso Esteves * Carlos Aclemar * Antonio Dávila * Alejandro Plancarte * Hilda Grey * Roberto Y. Palacios as Jugador Chino * José Escanero as Comisario * Leonor Gómez as Puestera * Isabel Herrera as Puestera * Ignacio Peón as Melquiades * María Luisa Smith as Doña Quirinita, billetera anciana * Enrique Zambrano as Doctor == References == == Bibliography == * Rogelio Agrasánchez. Cine Mexicano: Posters from the Golden Age, 1936-1956. Chronicle Books, 2001. == External links == * Category:1953 films Category:1953 drama films Category:Mexican drama films Category:Mexican films Category:Spanish-language films Category:Films directed by Raphael J. Sevilla
title: The Lottery Ticket Seller
